00019    using namespace Util;
00020 
00021    /*
00022    * Constructor
00023    */
00024    ConfigIoFactory::ConfigIoFactory(Simulation& simulation)
00025     : simulationPtr_(&simulation)
00026    {}
00027 
00028    /* 
00029    * Return a pointer to a instance of ConfigIo subclass className.
00030    */
00031    ConfigIo* ConfigIoFactory::factory(const std::string &className) const
00032    {
00033       ConfigIo *ptr = 0;
00034 
00035       // Try subfactories first.
00036       ptr = trySubfactories(className);
00037       if (ptr) return ptr;
00038 
00039       if (className == "DdMdConfigIo") {
00040          ptr = new DdMdConfigIo(*simulationPtr_);
00041       }
00042  
00043       return ptr;
00044    }
00045 
00046 }
00047 #endif
